subject: Sponsorship Opportunity
description_text:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well.

I am a mechanical engineering student at the University of British Columbia
Okanagan campus and a member of UBCO Motorsports, our university's Formula
SAE team. We are a team of highly motivated and diverse students who build
both electric and internal combustion prototype race cars to compete
annually against other university teams at the international FSAE
competitions.

We are hoping to start a discussion with you regarding potential
sponsorship opportunities that Simsonn may be open to and what would be
asked of us to help facilitate that partnership. Our audience goes beyond
the 13,000+ students, faculty, and staff at UBCO as we engage with the
Kelowna community at public events and outreach initiatives. Our social
media has over 2,000 followers with about 4,500 impressions across our
platforms each week as well.

Receiving sponsorships and building these relationships is critical for
overcoming the challenges our team takes on each year designing and
building our race cars. Would you be able to send any relevant information
or an application form if that is possible? Would you be willing to set up
a meeting with me either over the phone or over zoom? We recently hit the
construction phase of our simulator, and are now testing the hardware we
currently have, which notably lacks load cell pedals such as Simsonn's Plus
X and Pro X models. Attached is a video of our recent simulator shakedown!

I have attached a PDF showcasing more about who we are as well as our
sponsorship package. These will give you a better idea of what we do as a
team and our partnership opportunities. Let us know if you would be
interested in helping our team and supporting the great engineers and
leaders of tomorrow!

Thank you,


Arthur Ribas Pinel

UBCO MOTORSPORTS
